item.title: Reddit r/functionalprogramming community
item.description: r/functionalprogramming was created nearly seven years ago. It started when I was interested in contributing to Apache Commons Functor. I created it to have a place to collect links about functional programming. To my surprise there was no subreddit for functional programming. So I created one. Fast forward a few years, the community is still active, with a healthy group of nearly 10.000 readers and contributors. Nowadays I spend something like 5 to 20 minutes everyday moderating posts.
